HistoryCRCSurveillance

title: Post-colorectal cancer resection surveillance

description: Patients with a history of colorectal cancer should begin colonoscopy surveillance 1 year pos-resection. Repeat colonoscopy 3 years after 1st surveillance, and every 5 years thereafter. Post-polypectomy surveillance intervals apply if shorter. Refer to patient's oncologic treatment team of survivorship care plan for patient-specific guidance.

action.title: Post-colorectal cancer resection surveillance
action.description:
Patients with a history of colorectal cancer should begin colonoscopy surveillance 1 year pos-resection.

Repeat colonoscopy 3 years after 1st surveillance, and every 5 years thereafter. Post-polypectomy surveillance intervals apply if shorter.

Refer to patient's oncologic treatment team of survivorship care plan for patient-specific guidance.
